snippet: After a data breach and an expansion into Canada that has floundered, the retailer opted to hire Brian Cornell, an industry veteran, as its new chief.
abstract: Target names Brian Cornell as chief executive, bringing in outsider to lead company for the first time as it seeks to overcome series of setbacks; will address damage done by extensive breach of customer information and disappointing expansion into Canada.
lead_paragraph: After a data breach and an expansion into Canada that has floundered, the retailer opted to hire Brian Cornell, an industry veteran, as its new chief.

headline.main: After a Series of Setbacks, Target Chooses an Outsider as C.E.O. for the First Time
headline.print_headline: After a Series of Setbacks, Target Chooses an Outsider as C.E.O. for the First Time
